eas_text: A civil authority has issued A LOCAL AREA EMERGENCY for the following counties or areas: Whatcom, WA; at 04:26 PM ON DEC 10, 2025 Effective until 09:26 PM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: Sumas - GO NOW. Flood evacuation occurring GO NOW. Evacuate Sumas. Flooding imminent. Shelter open at North County Christ the King in Lynden at 4pm. www.whatcomready.org
